Group.title: Required User Account Settings
Group.description: To support a secured and compliant configuration, a number of user account settings need to be modified from there default configuration.

Rule.title: Use PAM for Unix authentication.
Rule.description: Webmin must use the OS-provided Password Authentication Module for validating passwords.

Rule.title: Use passwd for changing passwords.
Rule.description: Webmin must use passwd for password changes so that password requirements configured in the operating system are enforced on new password selections.

Rule.title: Enable the ability for a user to change an expired password.
Rule.description: Webmin must enable a user to change their password when it has expired.
